overview:
Julio Gonzalez Arrivillaga is the CTO at Healthcare.com

Julio came from a distinguished career as COO, CFO, and later CEO of ClickDiario Network, a Hispanic online media portal and advertising network that reached 45 million monthly unique visitors.

In addition to managing business operations at ClickDiario, Mr. Arrivillaga had principal product responsibility for ClickDiario’s online properties. Mr. Arrivillaga, along with HealthCare.com CEO’s Matias de Tezanos, was one of the two principal founders of ClickDiario.com Network, which was acquired in 2007 by FOX Latin America, a division of News Corporation.
